sub_fields.title: Who you’re targeting, how you’ll reach them, and why this matters for Cardano?
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
We want to target all the Cardano projects wth this proposal, as in the current time, the projects are not practising the art of presenting the finances and other non-financial matters in an Accounting standard-compliant manner, most of the projects that we know are not putting in finances for business-to-understand.

We will publish educational material on the catalyst submissions, which can be utilised by anyone to practice and learn case-based application of the applicable accounting standards.

We will push the project on social media platforms such as LinkedIn in our relevant platform, given the merit of the same,

proper presentation and andistribution of financial information in essential for the growth of any economy, may it be a blockchain economy, such as Cardano as this will hl in better presentation and transparent and reliable presentation of information which shoulde be presented to stakeholders

sub_fields.title: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.description: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.answer:
As of today, these projects are not making accounting standard-compliant records if they are keeping some records, and in many cases, no records are even maintained.

We will provide the Model Examples of various standards for accounting with real-life made-up examples, and provide general information and material for these, followed by providing an easy grasp understanding of the general accounting standard.

sub_fields.title: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.description: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.answer: With these educational modules available for the community, the projects on Cardano can maintain better accounting records and accounting standard-compliant financial records, and get better access to the perks attached to this

sub_fields.title: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.description: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.answer:
With over 10 years of experience as a Chartered Accountant specialising in financial reporting, technical accounting, IFRS, Ind AS, hedge accounting, and GAAP conversions, I bring a strong foundation of professional discipline, compliance, and accountability to this project. I have led complex financial reporting and consolidation processes across industries such as renewable energy, manufacturing, and financial services, ensuring strict adherence to regulatory standards and accurate representation of financial information. My background in assurance and financial reporting advisory has equipped me with the capability to guide organisations through intricate accounting challenges while maintaining the highest standards of transparency and trust.



These capabilities position me well to deliver this project, which focuses on improving the financial reporting quality across Cardano ecosystem projects. I have a proven track record of designing and implementing accounting frameworks, managing large-scale GAAP conversion initiatives, and developing automated and efficient reporting processes. My work consistently involves collaborating with CFOs and senior stakeholders, reinforcing my ability to manage funds responsibly and communicate clearly with all parties involved.



To ensure the feasibility and effectiveness of this approach, I will validate the framework by applying accounting standards to real Catalyst use, testing the clarity, usability, and completeness of the educational material before publishing it.. By combining technical expertise, professional ethics, and structured validation steps, I can deliver this project with a high degree of reliability, accountability, and trustworthiness.

sub_fields.title: How does the cost of the project represent value for the Cardano ecosystem?
sub_fields.description: How does the cost of the project represent value for the Cardano ecosystem?
sub_fields.answer: This project delivers strong value for money because it creates openly accessible, example-based accounting education that Cardano projects can use to improve their financial reporting without paying for external consultants. By producing reusable modules, clear standards guidance, and practical examples for the entire ecosystem, a relatively small budget helps raise transparency, compliance, and financial maturity across many projects—not just one—making the impact broad, long-lasting, and cost-efficient.
